entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DEP0700 error when starting Maui Blazor Hybrid app without capability "runFullTrust" #18816
  • [.NET 8, Android] Button ripple effect not working #18815
  • "DEP0600: Deployment failed. Exception - The stub received bad data." if the project name has at least 35 characters #18814
  • Runtime error when using class library with render modes #18812
  • ListView rendering on Mac Catalyst is wrong #18811
  • Flyout behavior difference on iOS when using custom view #18809
  • .NET 8 MAUI Ignores Button.CornerRadius = '0' on Android device #18807
    .NET 8 SR3
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening #18806
  • Exception on Focus command of SKCanvasView #18805
  • [Android] Entry clear button requires tap to the right of appearance #18803
  • Aspire integration for service discovery #18802
  • [Testing] Test results no being pushed #18799
  • Datepicker focus and unfocus event not firing on android #18797
  • Items in a Listview header don't receive gesture events #18793
  • [Enhancement] Add IsVisible to MenuItem #18792
  • While using WebView in Xamarin forms, when user taps on print in website, saving in pdf is not happening. But when used this site in browser, saving in pdf is working fine. #18791
  • [Windows] When the DPI is adjusted to non-100%, drawing strings with GraphicsView creates jitter #18783
  • There's no provision for Alt Key Menu Bar Item activation. Keyboard Accelerators are defined at the MenuFlyoutItem level. #18782
  • For Accessbility, the Narrator not reading Label text which appears on Entry text changed #18781
  • FlexLayouts and ScrollViews cause unhandled InvalidOperationException in WinRT.Runtime.dll with message "Element not found" #18780
  • For Accessibility, the narrator not reading text with different culture in Widows #18779
  • iOS ScrollView stops working when keyboard is open #18776

Closed

  • .NET 8 MAUI Toolbar Transparency and Disappearance Issue #18764
  • .NET 8 - No reference to MauiUIApplicationDelegate and ViewRenderer<,> #18795
  • Hot Reload Doesn't work if another control references it #10506
    Backlog
  • MAUI for .net 6 does not work anymore after updating new VisualStudio 2022|.Net8 #18790
  • Not possible to use the decimal comma on the numeric keyboard in Android. #7582
    Backlog
  • [Testing] MauiCarouselRecyclerView occasionally fails when running Controls Device Tests #18733
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D12 #18675
    .NET 8 SR1
  • I can't to build my first MAUI App (by Microsoft manual) #18801
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D11 #18673
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D14 #18706
    .NET 8 SR1
  • ScrollView layout breaks if child controls IsVisible starts as false #18542
  • ListViewRenderer in Android crash the App #18778
  • .NET 7: Can't add a ListView to a grid position if the column's with is "auto" #18563
  • Events should be triggered on iOS #18582
  • ApplicationVersion parameter to dotnet build no longer works #14524
  • Unable to debug iOS MAUI app #15065
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #15381
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 MAUI project fails to build for Android in the command line as it's unable to detect the Android SDK path #16091
  • Maui 8 preview 6 Blank app iOS using windows host attached to physyical device cannot find part of MauiInfo.plist #16117
  • MAUI application shows the telemetry log as XAMARIN APP #18124
  • Sometimes Crash when using Maui Essentials Send Email #18181
  • Error - "Android" system image is incomplete #18629

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Address CollectionView virtualization #18813
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `WebView` #18810
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Add CollectionView UITests #18798
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C2 #18794
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.113 to 7.0.114 #18789
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    community ✨

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18742
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add/Remove CarouselView Layout Listener when view is add/removed from window #18771
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D12 #18677
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11 #18676
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Increase CA coverage in Core project #18736
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D14 #18709
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • Update to stable versions of .NET 8 #18732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Update readme with latest blog #18763
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [C] implicit style VSM do not override Manual value #18680
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 SR1
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR2
